idea-plugin.name: Vespa Schema Language Support
idea-plugin.description:
IntelliJ Plugin for Schema Language Server

Language support for the Vespa Schema language using LSP.

The plugin acts as a client for the Schema Language Server, providing tools for developing Vespa Schema files.

Features:

  • Error and warning highlighting
  • Code actions, including Quick fixes
  • Code completion
  • Go-to-definition
  • Find references
  • Documentation on hover
  • Semantic token highlighting
  • Renaming/refactoring
  • List document symbols

Requirements

The plugin requires Java 17 or greater. Upon activation, the plugin will look in the following locations in this order for a Java executable:

  • PATH environment variable
  • Workspace setting: vespaSchemaLS.javaHome
  • User setting: vespaSchemaLS.javaHome
  • JDK_HOME environment variable
  • JAVA_HOME environment variable
